name: Dog Game (peejaybee)
description:
Dog Game -- my final project for Educational Technology (CS 6460) at the Georgia Institute of Technology.  The goal of this game is to help educate players on the expense and work involved in adopting a dog.

PLAYING:

Click to move your character.  

Hover over points of interest to get a description.

Click the "mission" or "help" buttons for a mission list or help.  Clicking again dismisses the dialog.
